Pauline Snook

  1. Foster Name: Pauline
  2. Foster Family: Joe F. and Bertha Kaup
  3. Location of Family: West Point, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 1
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-03-05, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1994-02-19
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Pauline Ellis
  11. Spouse Name: Harvey Ellis
  12. Source: 1920 United States Federal Census; West Point News, 23 February 1994.
